dict.acceptation: 健康的；健全的；大量的；有益于健康的；

sent.orig: Healthy crowd includes healthy body, healthy psychology already, also include healthy behavior kind.
sent.trans: 健康的人群既包括健康的身体、健康的心理，也包括健康的行为方式。

sent.orig: A healthy body is the carrier of human resources, but also healthy living guarantee.
sent.trans: 健康的身体是人力资源的载体，也是健康生活的保证。

sent.orig: Provide healthy snacks and a healthy breakfast. A well balance diet maximizes your child's learning potential.
sent.trans: 给孩子提供健康的零食和早餐，一个良好的饮食结构会最大化您孩子的学习潜能。

sent.orig: A healthy mind is in a healthy body.
sent.trans: 健全的精神寓于健康的体魄。

sent.orig: And the milestone strategy - Healthy Weight, Healthy Lives - is their solution to the problem.
sent.trans: 而具有里程碑意义的“健康体重，健康生活”战略便是实现此目标的重要举措。
